Name: Maple-Flavor Ghost Gum
Description: Apparently Maple-flavored. Restores 25 Health to a Kamigotchi.

Name: Pom-Pom Fruit Candy
Description: A type of fruit candy. Restores 100 Health to a Kamigotchi.

Name: Gakki Cookie Sticks
Description: Fancy cookie sticks. Restores 200 Health to a Kamigotchi.

Name: XP Candy (Medium)
Description: Gain a decent amount of XP.

Name: XP Candy (Small)
Description: Gain a small amount of XP.

Name: Red Gakki Ribbon
Description: Bright red. Restores life to a fallen Kamigotchi.

Name: Holy Dust
Description: Allows you to change a Kamigotchi’s name once
